products.title: Botanica, Eau De Nil - Roman Blind
products.description: Welcome the natural shades of the outdoors into your home by including the garden-themed botanica in eau de nil, a subtle blind in dark, neutral oatmeal and toned with plant-life in soft browns and delicate aquas to add life and colour. Make the conservatory a peaceful little haven by theming it with the garden over which it lookds. Opt for wooden floors, as light as you like, and plenty of mixed fabrics, such as linens, voiles, and wools, in natural tones of bark and teal.

products.title: Acanthus, Navy - Roman Blind
products.description: In vintage retro style, the acanthus navy features large, ordered florals in deep navy, midnight blue, and golden camel, with various patterns and plain colourings. The overall effect is one of bold sophistication and contemporary traditionalism. Make the navy your dining room's focal point by anchoring it against white walls and complementing with light to medium woods and taupe and blue fabrics, cushions, and crockery.

products.title: Acanthus, Cherry - Roman Blind
products.description: In deep sage, golden biscuit, and berry red tones, and outlined in a rich navy blue, the acanthus cherry brings a classic sophistication to the table. Folded into the deep curves of the roman style, the retro-esque florals are softened, and the overall look has a distinctly vintage feel. Adopt a traditional, antique style in your dining room, pairing the cherry with strong mahogany woods and deep red accents.

products.title: Aquataine, Charcoal - Roman Blind
products.description: The aquataine charcoal is a sophisticated affair, mingling classic florals with slate and dove greys on a soft white canvas. This blind is a classy and stylish one, and you'll find that it adds a modish edge to any room it's placed in. Place a romantic take on monochrome, using the charcoal in a contemporary living room amongst a range of linens, wools, and voiles in greys, blacks, and whites. Choose ornaments and accessories in brushed silver or modern pewter to complement the scheme.

products.title: Art Deco, Cherry - Roman Blind
products.description: In rich berry red, the art deco in cherry is quite the eye-catcher. The bold base is adorned with art deco florals in teals, aquas, camels, and peaches, forming a wild and colourful canvas that simply cannot be missed. Dramatise your dining room, adding in the cherry as the central feature. Paint the walls in the pale peach found in the floral design, and keep the stronger colours for smaller accents.

products.title: Acanthus, Cornflower - Roman Blind
products.description: The vibrant, retro-esque print of the acanthus cornflower is pretty and eye-catching, sitting in lively cornflower blues and hushed apple greens. The soft oatmeal of the fabric tames the look, and the result is a gorgeously vintage style roman blind with both classic and contemporary overtones. Revive a dull kitchen with the addition of the cornflower. Choose wooden units, and garnish the table with linens and cushions in matching green and blue hues.

products.title: Fandango, Zinc - Roman Blind
products.description: The unusual look of the fandango zinc is a real eye-catcher. A jet black background is home to tropical foliage in zesty shades of grass green, candy pink, and turquoise blue and the effect is simply stunning. The zinc should be the star of the show so place it against a turquoise feature wall in your dining room, where it can take centre stage as the focal point of the room. Keep furniture up-to-date and contemporary, accessorising throughout the room with pink and green ornaments and wall art.

products.title: Amelie, Tearose - Roman Blind
products.description: Perhaps the most vibrant of the rustic amelie range, the pretty tearose is filled with wispy florals in tropical fuschia, pale coral, and soft grey. The grainy, dark cream backdrop, combined with the hessian-like cloth, adds to the vivid country style of this blind. Embrace a rural and romantic vibe in the master bedroom, using the sweet tearose as your base. Paint the walls in soft cream or baby pink, using chunky wooden furniture with a polished finish.

products.title: Fandango, Cranberry - Roman Blind
products.description: The beautiful fandango in cranberry is every bit as fantastic as it sounds, with naturally drawn foliage in stunningly tropical colours. And, made from 100% cotton, its high quality fabric sits prettily in neat, roman folds, looking just gorgeous wherever it's placed. Use the cranberry to breathe life into the master bedroom, surrounding it with matching fuchsias, purples, greens, and mustards, as well as some neutrals for toning.

products.title: Fandango, Cassis - Roman Blind
products.description: The tropical colour scheme of the fandango cassis will breathe life into any dcor scheme. Gorgeously rich foliage in bright fuchsia and apple greens adorn a creamy background, making this the perfect choice for colour lovers. Add the cassis to your spare bedroom for a colour scheme your guests will fall in love with. Place against an apple green feature wall, painting the other walls in creamy white.

products.title: Amelie, Primrose - Roman Blind
products.description: The amelie in primrose incorporates a delightfully cheerful lemon yellow and a range of wild leafy greens, anchored to a hessian-style background in oatmeal. The end result is a wild country chic, tempered only by the structured cut of the gorgeous roman style. Ditch the traditional turquoise and go for a balmy lemon colour scheme in your bathroom instead. Plump for rustic wooden floors, a roll-top bath, and yellow and cream tiling, choosing towels and bathmats in chalky sage.

products.title: Botanica, Willow - Roman Blind
products.description: The pretty botanica in willow brings the outside in, with it's natural oatmeal base that's scattered with fern illustrations in various shades of green. The fabric is light and versatile, making it perfect for the gentle folds of the roman blind. Ideal for hanging in a sunroom or casual sitting room, the willow would look stunning amidst other neutral tones and one or two natural greens. Include plenty of linens, wools, and other natural fabrics for a look that will put you and your guests instantly at ease.

products.title: Botanica, Heather - Roman Blind
products.description: Fashion an elegant yet natural atmosphere by adopting the botanica heather, a delicate, pond-themed print featuring ferns and grasses in dark sages and muted indigos. This pretty roman blind allows the linen fabric, lined with protective polycotton sateen, to fold beautifully into soft pleats. Convert your plain conservatory to a relaxing haven, full of natural colours, fabrics, and woods. Choose matching green and heather shades to complement those in the heather, and be sure to add plenty of oxygen-emitting plants to add to the outdoorsy feel.

products.title: Amelie, Wedgewood - Roman Blind
products.description: In soft, porcelain blues, wistful florals sit on a grainy cream background, making up the amelie in wedgewood. The fabric is nimble and mild, with the feel of the lightest of hessians, and it folds easily into the gathered pleats of the roman. Craft a scheme of vintage bliss, with a hint of romance, in the master bedroom, painting the walls a barely-there blue or sticking to classic cream. Fill the room with plenty of natural, country fabrics, such as linens, hessians, and wools.

products.title: Vintage Bunch Roman Blind
products.description: Full of traditional style and charm, the vintage bunch roman blind features gorgeous vintage-inspired bouquets with blooming flowers and trailing foliage. In a contemporary colour palette of sweet pastel pinks, vibrant yellows, cool greys and soft neutrals, this blind beaut full of traditional style and charm, the vintage bunch roman blind features gorgeous vintage-inspired bouquets with blooming flowers and trailing foliage.

products.title: Mid Stripe Candy Roman Blind
products.description: Featuring a joyful and cheerful colour palette, mid stripe candy from their cath kidston collection is inspired by colourful pyjamas and sheets that bring back fond childhood memories. Playful stripes in an array of vibrant colours take centre stage for this roman blind and bea featuring a joyful and cheerful colour palette, mid stripe candy from their cath kidston collection is inspired by colourful pyjamas and sheets that bring back fond childhood memories.

products.title: Button Spot Yellow Roman Blind
products.description: Bring the sunshine into your home all year round with the joyful button spot yellow roman blind by cath kidston. White spots are contrasted against the wonderfully vibrant yellow to create a simply sophisticated design that will bring the very best out of your interior.

products.title: Button Spot Blue Roman Blind
products.description: An iconic design by the fabulous cath kidston, button spot blue is a much-loved and popular print. Hand-drawn polka-dots pop against the soft blue fabric and theyre all slightly different, giving the design an extra charming detail. With its traditional style, this roman bl an iconic design by the fabulous cath kidston, button spot blue is a much-loved and popular print.

products.title: Birds And Roses Multi Roman Blind
products.description: The perfect way to make any space feel bright and colourful, the birds and roses multi roman blind features a gorgeous range of soft greens, yellows, pink and blues. The trailing flowers and sweet birds are full of delicate detail and eye-catching colours, so its easy to the perfect way to make any space feel bright and colourful, the birds and roses multi roman blind features a gorgeous range of soft greens, yellows, pink and blues.

products.title: Birds And Roses Blue Roman Blind
products.description: A dreamy combination of cath kidstons most loved design motifs, the birds and roses print features a delicate array of trailing flowers, with sweet birds and butterflies nested in between the leaves. The soft blue is beautifully serene, bringing tranquillity and the beauty a dreamy combination of cath kidstons most loved design motifs, the birds and roses print features a delicate array of trailing flowers, with sweet birds and butterflies nested in between the leaves.

products.title: Liliana Soft Pink Roman Blind
products.description: Despite its candyfloss shades, this liliana soft pink roman blind has a somewhat mature vibe to it. It hash undertones of blush and speckle of white for a tonal look. These shades are so beautiful when worked together, thick threads weaved and creating a wonderfully tactile f despite its candyfloss shades, this liliana soft pink roman blind has a somewhat mature vibe to it.

products.title: Liliana Dusty Lavender Roman Blind
products.description: What we love here is the sweet purple colour and the lovely woven finish thats soft to the touch and folds so beautifully. The liliana fabric has a subtle tactile quality that will bring a touch of charm to the window, wonderful for creating an cosy look. Ideal for upping the what we love here is the sweet purple colour and the lovely woven finish thats soft to the touch and folds so beautifully.

products.title: Liliana Summer Sky Roman Blind
products.description: Full of coastal charm, this liliana summer sky roman blue encapsulates all the shades of the shore. Deep blue, warm sky blue, a touch of sea green and the white of waves crashing. The fabric also feels wonderfully thick thanks to its woven texture, thick threads running across full of coastal charm, this liliana summer sky roman blue encapsulates all the shades of the shore.

products.title: Liliana Cloud Roman Blind
products.description: This liliana cloud roman blind is anything but just another cream window dressing. In fact, its so much more. It has so much texture, soft neutral, and wovem to perfection. This helps to give the fabric a great thickness also, giving your room such a cosseting feeling. What this liliana cloud roman blind is anything but just another cream window dressing.

products.title: Liliana Warm Grey Roman Blind
products.description: We know that this liliana warm grey roman blind is going to be an absolutely timeless classic. Its got style, grace and a whole lot of comfort running through the fabric. The neutral shade has a lovely twist of grey, creating a sense of calm in a busy home and inviting a whol we know that this liliana warm grey roman blind is going to be an absolutely timeless classic.

products.title: Liliana Lightest Taupe Roman Blind
products.description: If theres one blind that can bring a glamorous look whilst in keeping with the cottage chic vibe, it just has to be this liliana lightest taupe roman blind. The soft neutral brown has a rustic tinge to it, creating a design thats both sophisticated and cosy. Team with warm if theres one blind that can bring a glamorous look whilst in keeping with the cottage chic vibe, it just has to be this liliana lightest taupe roman blind.

products.title: Liliana Garnet Roman Blind
products.description: Soft to the touch and in an enviable deep red tone the liliana garnet roman blind is both vibrant and pretty as a picture. This dramatic wash of colour at the window will make a fantastic impact on a room and we can see its cotton rich texture fitting into elegant and sophisti soft to the touch and in an enviable deep red tone the liliana garnet roman blind is both vibrant and pretty as a picture.

products.title: Liliana Navy Roman Blind
products.description: This dark blue tone has a warm and cosy feel and with the fabrics inky finish theres a scoop of drama too. The liliana navy blind with all its character looks stunning at the window and when the light catches it theres a gorgeous comforting looks just like the cosiest of bl this dark blue tone has a warm and cosy feel and with the fabrics inky finish theres a scoop of drama too.

products.title: Liliana Slate Roman Blind
products.description: This liliana slate roman blind is anything but plain, with a lovely woven texture and undertones of charcoal and jet-black coming through the modern grey. This tonal addition creates a blind that does anything but look flat and dull. Team with other tonal materials, such as g this liliana slate roman blind is anything but plain, with a lovely woven texture and undertones of charcoal and jet-black coming through the modern grey.

products.title: Providence Flint Roman Blind
products.description: Give your home a contemporary and cosy feel with this gorgeous providence flint roman blind, featuring a warm, steely colouring that will give your room a metropolitan accent. Cotton rich, this full and fine fabric features a natural, slubby texture that gives the blind a gentl give your home a contemporary and cosy feel with this gorgeous providence flint roman blind, featuring a warm, steely colouring that will give your room a metropolitan accent.

products.title: Providence Softest Grey Roman Blind
products.description: If you're trying to create a gentle contrast to a calm coloured room, then this providence softest grey roman blind is the perfect choice for you. The cotton-rich fabric is beautifully soft in both colour and texture, allowing you to use this blind to create a light, airy feel if you're trying to create a gentle contrast to a calm coloured room, then this providence softest grey roman blind is the perfect choice for you.

products.title: Providence Pewter Roman Blind
products.description: Give your home a metropolitan makeover with this striking and contemporary providence pewter roman blind. This beautiful cotton-rich fabric will provide a smoky contrast in a more neutral environment, it's slate-grey tones making a statement at your window and giving your room give your home a metropolitan makeover with this striking and contemporary providence pewter roman blind.

products.title: Fiji, Bark - Roman Blind
products.description: The fiji in distinct bark is sure to add an elegant finish to any room in the home. This bronze-hued blind, formed from a voile-like cloth and silky thread, oozes sophisticated chic with its delicately textured finish and alluring metallic tone. Transform a plain chocolate brown or magnolia palette in your living room by blending the striking bark with unique shading and bronzed tones, including copper accessories and complementing burnished oddments to create a stylish and urban finish with a current metallic infusion.

products.title: Fiji, Green - Roman Blind
products.description: Rejuvenate and energise your home by including the fiji in a refreshing, muted lime green tone. This sleek blind is made from a voile-like fabric and silky, metallic-infused thread to form an elegant finish with vibrant colour and subtle texture. Revive a basic white bathroom or sun lounge with sprightly tones of lime, olive, and avocado greens for a stylish lift and a boost of stimulating colour, combining with metallic materials and accessories to elaborate the shimmering blind and create elegant continuity.

products.title: Fiji, Mocha - Roman Blind
products.description: Generate an elegant and impressive style with the fiji range in a luscious mocha shade, combining sheer fabrics with metallic infused thread. This luxurious blend forms a distinct blind with delicate texture, producing a smart and sophisticated finish. Combine the mocha with warm and inviting neutral tones like ivory, biscuit, and oatmeal, adding depth and cosiness with layered linens in alike shades.

products.title: Fiji, Natural - Roman Blind
products.description: Produce an elegant and stylish look with the fiji in natural in a beguiling golden shade, where silky thread meets voile-like fabric for a distinctive appearance and added charisma. This delicate fusion produces a sophisticated blind with subtle texture for a touch of tasteful character. Combine the natural with ivories, golds, and honeyed tones for a sleek aesthetic, adding comforting, sumptuous linens and sheer fabrics for a refined edge.

products.title: Pavillion, Duckegg - Roman Blind
products.description: Cream and blue always makes for a striking pairing, and the pavillion in duckegg is no different. Intricate stitching creates a sectioned pattern interjected with rectangular shapes and the effect is both stylish and attractive. Use the duckegg to create a classic look in your living room. Keep creams and pale biscuits as the base colour scheme, using blues to accent throughout. Opt for plush fabrics for a luxurious feel, adding plenty of scatter cushions as well as wall art and ornaments.

products.title: Acacia, Natural - Roman Blind
products.description: For a distinct dcor scheme with lavish fabric and dazzling colour, include the splendid acacia in natural, with its plush embellishment and quilted texture, and where a charming foliage display is formed from opulent gold and emerald threads. The sophisticated cream background provides refined style and elegance. Combine the natural with an assortment of layered fabrics and luxuriously embellished details for a welcoming and affluent look.

products.title: Pavillion, Ochre - Roman Blind
products.description: Gold and silver combined will always make for glamorous look and the pavillion ochre brings a sense of gentle sophistication wherever it goes. The intricate stitching of the eye-catching pattern blends the two shades to create a beautifully stylish roman blind. The ochre would look just gorgeous in the living room, where surrounding it with rich cream walls and sofas will allow it to stand out. Add throws and scatter cushions in gold and silver tones, and go for medium woods throughout for contrast.

products.title: Tweety, Duckegg - Roman Blind
products.description: The pretty pastel shades of the tweety duckegg offer a cheery and summery feel that will last all year long. Think minty turquoise and pale candy pink matched with the occasional petrol blue and deep magenta for a blind that's full of life and colour. Provide a white wall with a delicious colour pop in a child's room or spare bedroom. Use the pale turquoise in the blind as the key colour for the rest of the room, coordinating it with bedding, rugs, and other accessories, and bringing in other elements from the blinds to accent.

products.title: Tweety, Charcoal - Roman Blind
products.description: You'll love the cool, jaded tones of the tweety in charcoal. Its contemporary bird and tree patterning plays host to a muted charcoal grey, as well as understated tones of sage green, ice blue, indigo purple, mustard yellow, and creamy biscuit. What more could you want?Hang the charcoal in the living room or kitchen, where the sweet birds will sit pretty and add character to the space. Choose an accent colour from the blind and use it throughout the room to bring the tone to life.

products.title: Tweety, Natural - Roman Blind
products.description: In sweet and cheery shades of sunny orange, lemon yellow, cool aqua, and many more, the tweety natural is a prettily formed roman blind with as much character as colour. Adorable birds sit atop neutrally toned branches, giving a contemporary yet natural look. Use the natural as a key design element in a cutely kitsch kitchen, surrounding it with natural woods and creamy units. Use your favourite colours from the fabric to decide on accenting colours to be carried across by utensils, accessories, and the like.

products.title: Castelli, Duckegg - Roman Blind
products.description: Sleek and sophisticated, the castelli in duck egg just oozes sophistication. Displaying classic thin stripes, in duck egg and rich cream, this roman blind gives a timeless look of class and style that will add a feeling of luxury to any home. Give the duck egg a home in a serenely dcorated living room, surrounded by pale duck egg walls and cream furnishings. Opt for plushly textured fabrics, such as chenille and soft wool, to add depth and cosiness to the room.

products.title: Castelli, Natural - Roman Blind
products.description: The castelli natural is a beautiful shade of golden cream, with a luxurious chenille-like texture bringing depth of colour and character to the fabric. The various stitching types make this more than a flat fabric blind, offering a feeling of luxe class you'll find irresistible. Add the natural to any room in need of a touch of lush comfort, and surround it with contrasting rich tones, such as plum or chocolate, perhaps as part of a feature wall.

products.title: Castelli, Earth - Roman Blind
products.description: Think elegant stripes drawn in equally classy shades of stone grey and antique cream, and you've got the castelli in earth. Less is always more, as they say, and this timeless roman blind certainly proves the point. Include the earth in a sumptuous yet sophisticated living room or dining room, where creams and greys abound, and plush fabrics rule the roost. Keep the colour scheme classic and understated, without loud colours - this beautiful look will speak for itself every time.

products.title: Paradise Willow Green Roman Blind
products.description: Paradise, a beautiful and special roman, the leaf style giving that bit more elagance. At an affordable price the blind would be wonderful in your house. This cream roman blind has a bold leaf print that will be a great statement piece in any room in your home. products.title: Paradise Slate Roman Blind
products.description: Paradise, a beautiful and special roman, the leaf style giving that bit more elagance. At an affordable price the blind would be wonderful in your house. This black roman blind has a bold cream and blue leaf print that will be a great statement piece in any room in your home. products.title: Barbican Charcoal Roman Blind
products.description: The barbican range comes in 4 different colour variations. Add more dimension to your decor with thebeautiful striped pattern. The barbican charcoal roman blind will be an elegant addition to your room. products.title: Real Silk True Bronze  Roman Blind
products.description: For true luxury, this real silk true bronze is a splendid choice. Even the name suggests so. The slubbed fabric comes lined with their special uv protective backing, so upkeep doesn't have to be a worry. The colour is quite something too. Perfect for those wanting a warm neutral for true luxury, this real silk true bronze is a splendid choice.

products.title: Real Silk Platinum Roman Blind
products.description: This most elegant of real silk roman blinds is done out in platinum silver tones and is beautifully shot through with slubs and crepes to give it a luxuriously textured finish. Dupion silk is the height of sophistication and style and this gorgeous metallic shade will give you this most elegant of real silk roman blinds is done out in platinum silver tones and is beautifully shot through with slubs and crepes to give it a luxuriously textured finish.
